title: Stopping Within School Areas
summary: Prohibits stopping a vehicle at any time in designated school areas where signage indicates restrictions.

title: Stopping Near School Crossings
summary: Prohibits stopping within 30 meters before and 15 meters after a designated school crossing.

title: Vending Vehicles Parking Restrictions
summary: Prohibits vending vehicles from parking on highways, parking lots, or parkades without prior authorization.

title: Boulevard Parking
summary: Prohibits parking on or over a boulevard unless explicitly authorized by signage.

title: Parking Near Driveways
summary: Prohibits parking in front of or within 2 meters of a driveway.

title: Obstructing a Driveway
summary: Prohibits parking in a manner that obstructs or is likely to obstruct vehicles using a driveway.

title: Parking Near a Fire Hydrant
summary: Prohibits parking within 3 meters of a fire hydrant.

title: Parking Near an Intersection
summary: Prohibits parking within 10 meters of an intersection, or up to 30 meters where indicated by signage.
